review: This is a great device to add more entertainment to your TV.  I have high speed internet and cable through Midcontinent Communications and I have the Fire TV connected to my TV through a home theater receiver.  It works exactly as advertised. I haven't experienced any buffering or other issues.  The picture quality is excellent and the responsiveness is too.  I have Amazon Prime so I have lots of movies/TV to watch whenever I want.  Yesterday I loaded the watchESPN app so that I could watch football being broadcast on ESPN3.  It was simple to confirm my Midcontinent account and the HD picture quality was still excellent.  What a great way to watch a game instead of on a PC screen!  I also listen to my music collection through my home theater with it.  It's easy to pick what you want to listen to on the TV screen, then the screen saver comes on as you listen so there aren't any issues there either.  I'd buy it again without any hesitation.  Definitely worth the money.
author: Mike
